name: Maven Black-Briar

aspects.high_concept: Ruthless Matriarch of the Black-Briar Family
aspects.trouble: Too Many Enemies, Too Many Secrets
other_aspects: Dark Brotherhood and Thieves Guild Connections
Will Become Jarl if Imperials Win

stunts: Power Broker: +2 to Rapport when making deals or calling in favors from powerful individuals
Untouchable: Once per session, automatically negate legal consequences through connections
Criminal Empire: Has access to Thieves Guild, Dark Brotherhood, and extensive merchant network
notes: Maven Black-Briar is the matriarch of the Black-Briar family and one of the most powerful people in Riften. She owns the Black-Briar Meadery, controls much of Riften's criminal activity, and has connections to both the Thieves Guild and Dark Brotherhood. Maven is ruthless, manipulative, and absolutely intolerant of threats to her power. She uses blackmail, intimidation, and violence to maintain control. If the Empire wins the civil war, she becomes Jarl of Riften. The Thieves Guild operates with her blessing and protection in exchange for favors and a cut of major scores.
combat_tactics: Maven never fights directly. She has guards, assassins, and guild members to handle threats. If personally threatened, she uses blackmail and political power to destroy enemies.
social_interaction: Maven is imperious, condescending, and makes it clear she's in control. She speaks with authority and expects immediate compliance. She's shrewd in negotiations and always looking for leverage. While she can be cordial to those useful to her, she's quick to threaten those who oppose her. She respects power and competence but has no loyalty to anyone.

relationships.Brynjolf: Uses guild for her purposes, patron relationship
relationships.Dark Brotherhood: Has contract with them for eliminations

personality_notes.speaking_style: Imperious, threatening, condescending. Makes veiled and direct threats.
quirks: Always speaks from position of power
personality_notes.character_growth: N/A - Maven is consistent in her ruthless pursuit of power

story_hooks: Provides protection and resources to Thieves Guild
Can become Jarl if Empire wins civil war
May request favors from guild members
Has information on major Riften figures
Can be powerful ally or dangerous enemy

dialogue_samples.greeting: What do you want? Make it quick - my time is valuable.
dialogue_samples.threat: Cross me and you'll find there's nowhere in Skyrim you can hide. I have friends in very dark places.
dialogue_samples.business: I respect competence. Serve my interests well and you'll be rewarded. Fail me and... well, don't fail me.
dialogue_samples.power_display: I own this city. The Jarl may sit in Mistveil Keep, but I hold the real power here. Remember that.
